summary: In Germany, as graduate student Katie Armstrong researches cannibal killer Oliver Hagen for her thesis, she becomes obsessed with her subject and ultimately plunges into a lifestyle similar to Hagen's and the thousands of people like him.
cast: Thomas Kretschmann|Keri Russell|Thomas Huber|Rainier Meissner|Marcus Lucas|Angelika Bartsch|Alexander Martschewski|Nils Dommning|Pascal Andres|Axel Wedekind|Tatjana Clasing|Horst D. Scheel|Stefan Gebelhoff|Helga Bellinghausen|Bojan Heyn|Valerie Niehaus|Nikolai Kinski|Kirsten Dabeis|Karl-Heinz Kraus|Sybille J. Schedwill|Klaus Christian Eckhard|Renate Naujoks|Sigrid Burkholder|Dagmar Sachse|Ruth Aetzler|Jörg Reimers|Pierre Shrady|Jonas Gruber|Bjoern Heuser|Anatole Taubman|Michael Baute|Steve Alterman|Bridget Hoffman|Guido Böhm|André Reissig
title: El caníbal de Rothenburg
